column1: Disappointed, after visiting 701 Rio Rancho Road, Pomona, CA 91766 @Target a few people without mask. Long lines to pay and too many people in the store at once. Putting the public & employees in danger. Wrong @LACHealthSrvs #CoronavirusOutbreak #COVID19 #coronavirus #Pomona
